title: ‘No One Wants to See Jonas Grow Stronger’: Rivals Aim to Crush Vingegaard’s Tour de France Chances Early
content:
'We expect UAE to drop the hammer every day': UAE, Red Bull turn screws in Tour opener to apply pressure on Jonas Vingegaard.

Read the full article at ‘No One Wants to See Jonas Grow Stronger’: Rivals Aim to Crush Vingegaard’s Tour de France Chances Early on Velo.
author: ahood
